text: Arithmetic Instructions 1. Addition and Subtraction + ”ADD': Adds two operands. + ”ADC”: Adds two operands with carry. + ”sUB': Subtracts the second operand from the first. + ”sBB': Subtracts the second operand from the first with borrow. + “INC': Increments the operand by 1. + ”DEC': Decrements the operand by 1. + “NEG': Negates the operand (two's complement). 2. Multiplication and Division + ImUL': Signed multiplication. + ”IDIV : Signed division + Note: These may affect the overflow flag but not necessarily the zero or sign flags. s
